channel.title: [SECOND SCRIPT]Autotalker please check this out

item.title: [SECOND SCRIPT]Autotalker please check this out
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

Autotalker…
If you have SRL put under program

{.include srl/srl.scar}

And instead of SendKeys

Put

TypeSend; you dont need + chr(13)) or anything

At the bottom The until false is suppose to be until(false)

for the find collor thing put

if(findcolorspiral(x,y,Colors,0,0,1279,959)

for the chat effect or something

put

(or w/e) (or in w/e order) (you done need to put that Chr!)
Typesend(‘cyan:Wave2: hi’)

And delete all of that color stuff.

And thats all i can see wrong…

O at the end after the begin,before the repeat, put
ActivateClient; and
SetUpSRL;
Thats it…

Glad i can help.

Read full topic

item.title: [SECOND SCRIPT]Autotalker please check this out
item.dc:creator: @emodude emodude
item.description:
@emodude wrote:

ok well im actualy makeing a seers maple cutter for my self since my screen resolution is alot different so yeah and it works so far.
clicks randomly on a certain color instead of clickmouse its holdmouse then waitsomething+random you know so less detectable then release mouse but before holdmosue i have movemousesmooth but i need something better cuz it goes to quick and i just cant figure a way to open the bank its kinda hard since theres like 200 of the same color lol

item.title: [SECOND SCRIPT]Autotalker please check this out
item.dc:creator: @dave5534 dave5534
item.description:
@dave5534 wrote:

program Auto_Talker; begin repeat Wait(2000) SendKeys('runescape is fun'+chr(13)) until(IsFKeyDown(12)) end.
this is just like yours but less effort

Read full topic

Please don’t take offense from this but it’s a bit simple for a first script, I hoped you would go there and progress in scripting.

item.title: [SECOND SCRIPT]Autotalker please check this out
item.dc:creator: @emodude emodude
item.description:
@emodude wrote:

[scar]
////////////////////////////////
// Dude’s Talker //
//Change it if u will but it //
//Works fine. //
////////////////////////////////
//So far undetectible but dont//
//use for over an hour //
////////////////////////////////
//Further instructions down in//
//the script otherwise dont //
//Change anything //
////////////////////////////////
{.include Osi.txt}
//-----------Script-----------\
const
Colors=16777215;//Change this to any color that is on the page
procedure typemessage;
begin
if
findcolor(x,y,Colors,0,0,1279,959) then
wait(2000+random(2500))//Only change the first number please unless you
//know what this does for first number 1000=1 second

sendkeys(‘Hello’)//Message you want to write
end;

begin
repeat
typemessage;
until false
end.
[/scar]

Its usefull fo rme atleast maybe not other people but i like it

Read full topic
